name: Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a flat bench with feet planted. Lower the barbell to mid-chest, then press up until arms are fully extended.

name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degree incline. Lower barbell to upper chest and press up.

name: Decline Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Set bench to decline position. Lower barbell to lower chest and press up.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie flat with dumbbells at chest level. Press dumbbells up until arms are extended, keeping them aligned.

name: Incline Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degree incline. Press dumbbells from upper chest position.

name: Dumbbell Flyes
instructions: Lie flat with dumbbells extended above chest. Lower with slight elbow bend in arcing motion, then squeeze back up.

name: Incline Dumbbell Flyes
instructions: Perform flyes on incline bench, targeting upper chest fibers.

name: Cable Flyes
instructions: Set cables high, step forward, and bring handles together in front of chest with slight elbow bend.

name: Push-Ups
instructions: Start in plank position. Lower body until chest nearly touches ground, then push back up.

name: Dips
instructions: Lean forward on parallel bars, lower body until shoulders are below elbows, push back up. More forward lean targets chest.

name: Chest Press Machine
instructions: Sit with back against pad, push handles forward until arms are extended.

name: Pec Deck Machine
instructions: Sit with back against pad, bring handles together in front of chest.

name: Overhead Press
instructions: Press barbell from shoulder level overhead until arms are fully extended. Keep core tight.

name: Seated Barbell Overhead Press
instructions: Seated version of overhead press, reducing leg drive and core involvement.

name: Dumbbell Overhead Press
instructions: Press dumbbells from shoulder height overhead. Can be done seated or standing.

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Start with palms facing you at chest level, rotate to palms forward while pressing overhead.

name: Lateral Raises
instructions: Raise dumbbells out to sides until parallel with ground, keeping slight elbow bend.

name: Front Raises
instructions: Raise dumbbells in front of body to shoulder height, alternating or together.

name: Rear Delt Flyes
instructions: Bend forward at hips, raise dumbbells out to sides targeting rear deltoids.

name: Cable Lateral Raises
instructions: Use cable at lowest setting, raise across body to shoulder height.

name: Face Pulls
instructions: Pull rope attachment toward face, separating hands and squeezing rear delts.

name: Upright Rows
instructions: Pull barbell up along body to chin level, leading with elbows.

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
instructions: Bench press with hands shoulder-width or closer, keeping elbows tight to body.

name: Tricep Dips
instructions: Keep body upright on parallel bars, lower and press up focusing on triceps.

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
instructions: Hold dumbbell overhead with both hands, lower behind head and extend back up.

name: Skull Crushers
instructions: Lie flat, lower barbell toward forehead by bending elbows, extend back up.

name: Cable Tricep Pushdowns
instructions: Push cable attachment down until arms are fully extended, keeping elbows stationary.

name: Rope Tricep Pushdowns
instructions: Push rope down and apart at bottom for maximum contraction.

name: Tricep Kickbacks
instructions: Bend forward, extend dumbbell back until arm is straight, squeeze tricep.

name: Diamond Push-Ups
instructions: Push-ups with hands forming diamond shape, emphasizing triceps.

name: Deadlift
instructions: Lift barbell from ground to standing position, maintaining neutral spine throughout.

name: Barbell Rows
instructions: Bend at hips, row barbell to lower chest/upper abdomen, squeeze shoulder blades.

name: Pendlay Rows
instructions: Barbell rows starting from floor each rep, explosive pull to chest.

name: T-Bar Rows
instructions: Straddle bar, pull handle to chest while maintaining hip hinge position.

name: Dumbbell Rows
instructions: Support yourself on bench, row dumbbell to hip, squeezing lat.

name: Seated Cable Rows
instructions: Pull cable handle to abdomen, keeping back straight and squeezing shoulder blades.

name: Chest Supported Rows
instructions: Lie chest-down on incline bench, row dumbbells to sides of torso.

name: Pull-Ups
instructions: Hang from bar with overhand grip, pull body up until chin over bar.

name: Chin-Ups
instructions: Pull-ups with underhand grip, emphasizing biceps more.

name: Lat Pulldowns
instructions: Pull bar down to upper chest while seated, squeeze lats at bottom.

name: Wide-Grip Lat Pulldowns
instructions: Lat pulldowns with wider grip, targeting upper lats and width.

name: Close-Grip Lat Pulldowns
instructions: Use close-grip attachment, pull to upper chest for lower lat emphasis.

name: Straight-Arm Pulldowns
instructions: Keep arms straight, push bar down in arcing motion, squeezing lats.

name: Shrugs
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides, elevate shoulders straight up, squeeze traps.

name: Barbell Shrugs
instructions: Hold barbell in front, shrug shoulders up toward ears.

name: Barbell Curls
instructions: Curl barbell from thighs to shoulders, keeping elbows stationary.

name: EZ Bar Curls
instructions: Curls using EZ bar for more wrist-friendly grip angle.

name: Dumbbell Curls
instructions: Curl dumbbells alternating or together, can rotate wrist during movement.

name: Hammer Curls
instructions: Curl dumbbells with neutral grip (palms facing each other) throughout movement.

name: Preacher Curls
instructions: Curl barbell while upper arms rest on preacher bench pad.

name: Incline Dumbbell Curls
instructions: Lie back on incline bench, curl dumbbells emphasizing stretch at bottom.

name: Concentration Curls
instructions: Seated, curl one dumbbell with elbow braced against inner thigh.

name: Cable Bicep Curls
instructions: Curl cable attachment, maintaining constant tension on biceps.

name: Spider Curls
instructions: Lean over incline bench, curl barbell with arms hanging straight down.

name: Wrist Curls
instructions: Rest forearms on bench, curl wrists up holding barbell.

name: Reverse Wrist Curls
instructions: Wrist curls with overhand grip, targeting extensors.

name: Farmer's Walk
instructions: Walk forward holding heavy dumbbells at sides, maintaining upright posture.

name: Barbell Squats
instructions: Bar on upper back, squat down until thighs parallel or below, drive back up.

name: Front Squats
instructions: Bar rests on front delts, squat with upright torso, emphasizes quads.

name: Bulgarian Split Squats
instructions: Rear foot elevated, lunge down on front leg, drive back up.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Push platform away with feet, lower under control to deep position.

name: Hack Squats
instructions: Back against pad, squat down in machine, emphasizes quads.

name: Leg Extensions
instructions: Seated, extend legs until straight, squeeze quads at top.

name: Lunges
instructions: Step forward into lunge, drive back to start. Can be walking or stationary.

name: Walking Lunges
instructions: Continuous forward lunges, alternating legs.

name: Goblet Squats
instructions: Hold single dumbbell at chest, squat down keeping upright torso.

name: Romanian Deadlifts
instructions: Hinge at hips, lower bar down legs keeping slight knee bend, feel hamstring stretch.

name: Stiff-Leg Deadlifts
instructions: Similar to RDLs but with straighter legs, emphasizing hamstring stretch.

name: Leg Curls
instructions: Lying or seated, curl legs up toward glutes, squeeze hamstrings.

name: Nordic Hamstring Curls
instructions: Kneel with feet anchored, lower torso forward under control using hamstrings.

name: Good Mornings
instructions: Bar on upper back, hinge forward at hips keeping back straight, return to standing.

name: Hip Thrusts
instructions: Upper back on bench, drive hips up with barbell on lap, squeeze glutes at top.

name: Glute Bridges
instructions: Lie on ground, drive hips up with barbell, squeeze glutes.

name: Cable Pull-Throughs
instructions: Face away from cable, pull through legs by driving hips forward.

name: Sumo Deadlifts
instructions: Wide stance deadlift, hands inside legs, emphasizes glutes and inner thighs.

name: Standing Calf Raises
instructions: Rise up on toes, lower heels below platform for full stretch.

name: Seated Calf Raises
instructions: Seated with weight on knees, raise up on toes, emphasizes soleus.

name: Calf Press on Leg Press
instructions: Use leg press machine with toes on platform, press through calves.

name: Planks
instructions: Hold rigid body position on forearms and toes, maintain neutral spine.

name: Crunches
instructions: Lie on back, curl upper body toward knees, squeezing abs.

name: Cable Crunches
instructions: Kneel below cable, crunch down bringing elbows to knees.

name: Hanging Leg Raises
instructions: Hang from bar, raise legs up keeping them straight or bent.

name: Ab Wheel Rollouts
instructions: Roll ab wheel forward, return to start position maintaining tight core.

name: Russian Twists
instructions: Seated lean back, rotate torso side to side holding weight.

name: Side Planks
instructions: Hold body straight on one forearm and side of foot.

name: Bicycle Crunches
instructions: Alternating elbow to opposite knee in cycling motion.

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Plank position, alternately drive knees to chest rapidly.

name: Hyperextensions
instructions: On hyperextension bench, lower torso and raise back up, squeezing lower back.

name: Incline Push-Ups
instructions: Push-ups with hands elevated, easier variation targeting lower chest.

name: Decline Push-Ups
instructions: Push-ups with feet elevated, harder variation emphasizing upper chest.

name: Landmine Press
instructions: Press one end of barbell from shoulder level, other end anchored on ground.

name: Machine Shoulder Press
instructions: Seated machine press overhead until arms extended.

name: Reverse Pec Deck
instructions: Face machine, push handles back targeting rear delts.

name: Cable Crossovers
instructions: Cables high, bring handles down and together in front of body.

name: Low Cable Crossovers
instructions: Cables low, bring handles up and together targeting upper chest.

name: Deficit Deadlifts
instructions: Stand on platform, deadlift with increased range of motion.

name: Rack Pulls
instructions: Deadlift from elevated position (pins in rack), partial range emphasizing lockout.

name: Meadows Rows
instructions: One-arm landmine row, pull end of barbell to hip.

name: Seal Rows
instructions: Lie face down on elevated bench, row barbell up.

name: Inverted Rows
instructions: Hang under bar at waist height, pull chest to bar.

name: 21s Curls
instructions: 7 half reps bottom to mid, 7 half reps mid to top, 7 full reps.

name: Zottman Curls
instructions: Curl up with supinated grip, rotate to pronated at top, lower slowly.

name: Reverse Curls
instructions: Curl with overhand grip, targeting brachioradialis and forearm extensors.

name: Pause Squats
instructions: Squat with 2-3 second pause at bottom position.

name: Box Squats
instructions: Squat to box, pause briefly touching box, explode up.

name: Sissy Squats
instructions: Lean back while lowering knees forward, intense quad isolation.

name: Single-Leg Romanian Deadlifts
instructions: Balance on one leg, hinge forward with dumbbell, feel hamstring stretch.

name: Glute Ham Raises
instructions: Lock feet in GHR machine, lower body forward and pull back up with hamstrings.

name: Reverse Hyperextensions
instructions: Lie face down, raise legs up behind you, squeezing glutes.

name: Kickbacks
instructions: Attach ankle strap, kick leg back squeezing glute.

name: Step-Ups
instructions: Step up onto elevated platform, drive through front leg.

name: Leg Press Calf Raises
instructions: On leg press, press through balls of feet for calf raises.

name: Donkey Calf Raises
instructions: Bent over position, raise up on toes with weight on lower back.

name: Dead Bugs
instructions: Lie on back, alternately extend opposite arm and leg while maintaining core stability.

name: Pallof Press
instructions: Hold cable at chest, press out resisting rotation, anti-rotation core work.

name: Woodchoppers
instructions: Rotate torso pulling cable from high to low diagonally across body.

name: Decline Sit-Ups
instructions: Sit-ups on decline bench for increased difficulty.

name: Turkish Get-Ups
instructions: Complex movement from lying to standing while holding weight overhead.

name: Weighted Planks
instructions: Standard plank with weight plate on back for added resistance.

name: L-Sits
instructions: Hold body off ground with legs extended forward forming L-shape.

name: Toes to Bar
instructions: Hang from bar, raise legs all the way up touching toes to bar.

name: V-Ups
instructions: Simultaneously raise arms and legs from lying position, forming V-shape.

name: Hollow Body Hold
instructions: Lie on back with lower back pressed down, hold arms and legs slightly elevated.

name: Band Pull-Aparts
instructions: Hold band at chest level, pull apart stretching band across chest.

name: Banded Lateral Walks
instructions: Band around knees or ankles, walk sideways maintaining tension.

name: Trap Bar Deadlifts
instructions: Deadlift using trap bar (hex bar), more quad-dominant than conventional.

name: Smith Machine Squats
instructions: Squat with barbell on fixed vertical track.

name: Smith Machine Bench Press
instructions: Bench press on smith machine with fixed bar path.

name: Machine Rows
instructions: Seated machine row, pull handles to torso squeezing back.

name: Assisted Pull-Ups
instructions: Pull-ups with machine assistance for those building strength.

name: Assisted Dips
instructions: Dips with machine assistance for progressive overload.

name: Lying Leg Curls
instructions: Lie face down, curl legs up toward glutes.

name: Seated Leg Curls
instructions: Seated position, curl legs down behind seat.

name: Abductor Machine
instructions: Push legs outward against pads, targeting hip abductors.

name: Adductor Machine
instructions: Pull legs inward against pads, targeting hip adductors.

name: Kettlebell Swings
instructions: Explosive hip hinge swinging kettlebell from between legs to chest height.

name: Burpees
instructions: Drop to push-up, jump feet back in, explosive jump up. Full body conditioning.
